title: Time & Distance â€“ Hard Level
description: Answer all questions. Each carries 1 mark.

questions.title: Two trains of 200 m each cross each other in 20 seconds at combined speed 72 km/h. The relative speed in m/s is:
A train 150 m long crosses a man walking at 3 km/h opposite to train direction in 6 seconds. Train speed?
A 500 m train crosses a platform in 50 seconds at 54 km/h. Platform length?
A boat takes 3 hours to go downstream 24 km and 4 hours upstream same distance. Still water speed?
